history.proof: intros R1 R2 S1 S2 H1 H2. qsimpl time: 1 use: compond_relation. - qsimpl time: 1 use: compond_relation,app_same_relation. apply same_relation_Symmetric. qsimpl time: 1 use: compond_relation,app_same_relation. + srun best use: @compond_relation_inclusion. + srun best use: @compond_relation_inclusion. - qsimpl time: 1 use: compond_relation,app_same_relation. qsimpl time: 1 use: compond_relation,app_same_relation. srun best use: @compond_relation_inclusion.

original: intros R1 R2 S1 S2 H1 H2. unfold Proper. unfold respectful. intros x y Hx. unfold compond_relation. apply same_relation_Transitive with (y:=R2 x). - apply app_same_relation. apply same_relation_Symmetric. apply H1. - apply same_relation_Transitive with (y:=S2 y). ++ apply app_same_relation. apply H2. ++ apply app_same_relation. apply same_relation_Reflexive.
